title: A compass is an essential tool
description: Essentially a compass is a magnet, generally a magnetized needle. Since opposites attract the southern pole of the needle is attracted to the Earth's natural magnetic north pole. Did you know that you can create your own simply with a paperclip, cork and a magnet?
completion_text: Now try adding the rest of the 'compass rose' components: the other cardinal directions (E, S, W and even NE, NW, SE and SW). Why not a hand holding it?

steps.hint: Sur une nouvelle ligne, set the outline of your compass with a `stroke` of `gold` color and size `20`
Définis the `color` of the compass to `gray`
Your compass is a `circle` with size `110`
Définis the `color` to `darkgray` for the second half of the compass
Dessine an arc that matches the top half of the compass - **tape** `arc 105, 2, 1`
We need to mark the north somehow - in a new line **tape** `moveTo 250, 175`
Write an N to represent north - **tape** `text 'N'`
Now we need a needle with 2 sides. Définis the `color` to `red` for the first side
Déplace-toi the cursor to position the needle **tape** `moveTo 230, 250`
Dessine a triangle with a polygon - **tape** `polygon 20, -90, 40, 0`
Excellent! Définis the `color` to `white` for the second side of the needle
Finish it with one last detail. Définis the `color` to `gold`
Déplace-toi the cursor to the center of the compass **tape** `move 20`
